title: New patch notes discuss...
body:
Just read the patch notes for 8.3 and I'm incredibly disappointed all the other skins getting sexy gold chroma's but not morg. 

Also Zoe "nerfs" please that is a laughable change there will be zero noticeable difference.

This tilted me though, "In the past, Viktor's strength has been partially defined by his ability to one-shot opponents with Q - Siphon Power plus Lich Bane."

Like being able to ONE SHOT an opponent with a single ability plus an item proc and you are buffing that?! Nobody should be able one shot someone with one ability like assassins don't even do that. I'm not talking about a spell rotation I'm saying a single ability plus and empowered auto. I assume that is late game 6 item viktor, even so that is 1 ability and an empowered auto dealing potentially 2k+. So he deserves to get a 60% shield off that as well plus a lower cd on his ult? #balanceteam

I know I'm low elo and "my opinion doesn't matter" I've just been playing this for nearly 8 years and that buff just seems stupid and outrageous to me.
